snippet.title: BANDIT KNIGHT | Limited Time Playtest Trailer!
snippet.description:
Join our first-ever Global Playtest now on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2421000/BANDIT_KNIGHT/

In BANDIT KNIGHT, players step into the boots of a master thief, tasked with liberating treasures from the greedy and corrupt. You’ll navigate perilous environments, using stealth and strategy to outsmart foes and avoid detection. With customizable tools and powerful relics, you can adapt your approach—whether you’re slipping by as a silent shadow or causing chaos. As you collect legendary treasures, unlock upgrades that enhance your abilities and prepare for even greater challenges. Every move counts as you rise to become the King of Thieves.

Join our communities:
Twitter: https://x.com/BanditKnightG
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@banditknight_game

#actiongames #pixelart #steam
